newsitem.title: USA: AMR'S American Eagle Nov load factor rises.
newsitem.headline: AMR'S American Eagle Nov load factor rises.

text.p: AMR Corp's American Eagle unit said its November load factor rose 0.07 points from a year ago to 56.9 percent.
The unit also said its system traffic was down 6.7 percent to 200.4 million revenue passenger miles. It said its available seat miles fell 7.9 percent to 352 million available seat miles.
For the month, 950,601 passengers boarded American Eagle flights, down 6.9 percent from a year ago, the unit also said.
Year-to-date boardings were up five percent to nearly 11.4 million passengers, the unit added.
